alert.note: Alert for Attala; Choctaw; Montgomery (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 10:53AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CHOCTAW...WESTERN OKTIBBEHA... EASTERN ATTALA...NORTHWESTERN WINSTON...WEBSTER AND CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM CST... At 1053 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Winona to near Ethel to near Zama. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kilmichael, Weir, French Camp, Mccool, and Lodi around 1100 AM CST. Chester around 1105 AM CST. Eupora, Ackerman, Walthall, Bellefontaine, Reform, and Embry around 1115 AM CST. Mathiston and Sherwood around 1120 AM CST. Maben, Sturgis, Cumberland, and Clarkson around 1125 AM CST. Mantee around 1135 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
